file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: todo-api
  description: Example Todo API Definition
  version: '0.1'
servers:
  - url: ''
paths:
  /api/todos/{id}:
    delete:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: delete a todo
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 1
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  deleted:
                    type: boolean
              example:
                '0':
                  value: '{"deleted": true}'
    patch:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: update a todo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/updateTodo'
            example:
              description: 'buy some milk'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  deleted:
                    type: object
              example:
                '0':
                  value: '{"deleted": true}'
  /api/todos/complete/{id}:
    patch:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: complete a todo
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 1
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  updated:
                    type: boolean
              example:
                '0':
                  value: '{"updated": true}'
  /api/todos:
    get:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: get all todos
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                properties: {}
              example:
                '0':
                  value: |
                    []
    post:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: create a todo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/newTodo'
            example:
              description: 'buy some milk'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  Description:
                    type: string
                  Completed:
                    type: boolean
                  Id:
                    type: integer
              example:
                '0':
                  value: |
                    {"Id":1,"description":"buy some milk","completed":false}
  /api/todos/completed:
    get:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: get all completed todos
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties: {}
              example:
                '0':
                  value: |
                    []
      servers:
        - url: ''
  /api/todos/incomplete:
    get:
      description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
      summary: get all incomplete todos
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Auto generated using Swagger Inspector
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/todo'
              example:
                '0':
                  value: |
                    []
components:
  schemas:
    todo:
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        description:
          type: string
        completed:
          type: boolean
        createdAt:
          type: string
        modifiedAt:
          type: string
    newTodo:
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
    updateTodo:
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
